title: Booki
description: The project focuses on creating a consistent user interface that adheres to the provided mockups, while respecting coding best practices and established technical constraints.

title: ohmyfood
description: The project focuses on creating a responsive website, designed with a mobile-first approach, and including sophisticated CSS animations. You will work from the provided mockups to create an adaptive site for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

title: Nina Carducci
description: The project focuses on providing essential functionalities to ensure secure and efficient user interactions through a comprehensive SEO strategy.

title: Kasa
description: This project centers on a complete overhaul of the existing website. It involves initializing a React project, developing the entire application including React components, as well as setting up routes with React Router.

title: Argent Bank
description: This project involves creating a user authentication system and designing APIs to implement essential functionalities for secure and efficient user interactions.

title: Book Finder
description: This project is designed to streamline the process of searching for books by leveraging the Google Books API. It offers a user-friendly web interface where users can easily search for books based on various criteria such as title, author, or ISBN.
